name: 约翰内斯·开普勒
bio_short: 德国天文学家、数学家和物理学家。他是17世纪科学革命的关键人物，以发现“开普勒行星运动三大定律”而闻名，证明了行星的轨道是椭圆形的。
bio_short_en: A German astronomer, mathematician, and physicist. He was a key figure in the 17th-century scientific revolution, best known for his 'Laws of Planetary Motion', which proved that planets orbit the Sun in elliptical paths.
